topic: 12. The best indicator of progress on a software project is the completion
options: of a defined engineering activity task
of a successful budget review meeting on time
and successful review of a defined software work product
and successful acceptance of project prototype by the customer
topic_cn: 12. 软件项目进展的最佳指标是完成
options_cn: 一个已定义的工程活动任务
按时成功召开预算评审会议
并成功评审一个已定义的软件工作产品
并被客户成功验收项目原型
